title: Consider Audience Interaction
text: Think about how involving the audience can make the presentation more engaging.

title: Avoid Monotony
text: Avoiding a monotone voice can help maintain audience interest.

title: Complex Jargon
text: Using complex jargon might confuse rather than engage the audience.

title: Reading from Slides
text: Reading directly from slides can make the presentation less dynamic.

hintAnswer: Incorporating interactive elements like polls or Q&A sessions.
title: Interactive Elements
text: Incorporating interactive elements like polls or Q&A sessions can keep the audience engaged.
choices: Using complex jargon to sound knowledgeable.
Incorporating interactive elements like polls or Q&A sessions.
